arcade.core.util

Class MiniBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.core.util.MiniBox

  • public class MiniBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Container that maps a key to a value.

    MiniBox objects are dictionaries that use a String to String hashmap. Utility methods are provided to return the contents as specific types.

      • compare

        public boolean compare(MiniBox box)
        Compares two MiniBox instances.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String id)
        Checks if the given key exists.
        Parameters:
        id - the key
        Returns:
        true if the key exists, false otherwise

      • filter

        public MiniBox filter(java.lang.String code)
        Filters keys by the given code.

        Entries in the form "key = value" where key = code/subkey can be filtered. The returned box contains all entries in the form "subkey = value" for all entries where the code matches the given code.

        Parameters:
        code - the code to filter by
        Returns:
        the filtered box
